name: detailedly
content:

Add to word list
including or considering all the information about something: Our study detailedly investigates the epidemiology of four common pathogens.
More examplesFewer examplesSome other issues will be mentioned in the following part, though they will not be detailedly discussed. The mixture is free from any particles with a diameter over 105 microns, as detailedly described below. Emerging technologies allow us to detailedly characterize and understand cancer genomes.The advantages of this process are detailedly reported in a separate chapter.
